t: Sebastian & Co. Fine Meats Butcher Shop — Studio Series Design
s: We brought the traditional look of a heritage British butcher and the raw vibes of an NYC meat packing district shop together to showcase the artistry in butchery by the Sebastian and Co Fine Meats team. We imported copper drum lights and special way finding sconces from England to locally ...

t: Meats – Sebastian & Co Fine Meats
s: For holidays or everyday occasions, we are happy to customize your poultry order … be it spatchcock, semi or fully de-boned, or a stuffed as a turducken. Bison, quail, venison, rabbit, and (depending on the season) elk are all game meats you can order at Sebastian & Co.
